main_definition: In the recent past or within a short period of time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Recently, over the last few days, weeks, or months.
meanings_and_examples.example: I haven't seen her in lately.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In terms of time, within a short period leading up to present moment.
meanings_and_examples.example: The weather has been getting colder and lately it rains almost every day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expressing the fact that something has happened or changed recently.
meanings_and_examples.example: Lately, I've started waking up earlier in the morning.
